To make a pepperoni and cheese pizza, preheat the oven to 425°F. Roll out pizza dough and place it on a greased baking sheet. Spread pizza sauce over the dough and top with shredded cheese and pepperoni slices. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown. Enjoy!

To make this dish, preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit. Place the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface and roll it out to the desired size. Spread the sauce over the pizza dough, then top with the desired toppings. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown.

To make this dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Place the pizza slices on a baking sheet and top with the bacon and cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the pizza is golden brown.

To make this dish, you will need two slices of pizza, bacon, cheese, and pepperoni. Preheat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Place the pizza slices on a baking sheet. Top with bacon, cheese, and pepperoni. Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly. Enjoy!
